author: ghost
body:
I am, too, expiriencing the problem.
WIN10, VS Code/ newest. 
Can't install anything with NPM
`npm : The term 'npm' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program. Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was
included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
At line:1 char:1`
`+ npm install`
`+ ~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : ObjectNotFound: (npm:String) [], CommandNotFoundException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CommandNotFoundException`

_Originally posted by @Lukortech in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/2863#issuecomment-406408431_
title: error while installing express
